description:
In this episode, see high school boys hold it for as long as possible, have a bad day, prepare for winter, run from a girl, choke on food, slip on the pavement, ride a bicycle, cook for their sister, and hang out at school.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Danshi Koukousei to Genkai / Danshi Koukousei to Kekka / Danshi Koukousei to Fuyu / Danshi Koukousei to Hashiru / Danshi Koukousei to Zouni / Danshi Koukousei to Jimen / Danshi Koukousei to Jitensha / Danshi Koukousei to Ryouri / Danshi Koukousei to Gakkou / Joshikousei wa Ijou "Kizuato o Tsuketa Onna-tachi"
